main.name: Ibrahim Mešan
main.bio: I am a software engineer specializing in mobile and web development. I have expertise in building robust mobile apps and enhancing digital platforms using React Native, Next.js, and Node.js. I am passionate about creating amazing UI interfaces and exceptional user experiences, dedicated to delivering high-quality software solutions
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me

work.title: Full-Stack Software Developer
work.description: As a dedicated Mobile and Web Developer at Gridlock, I was instrumental in developing and maintaining a cutting-edge mobile MPC (Multi-Party Computation) crypto wallet and enhancing the company’s digital presence through a robust blog and webpage. My role encompassed both frontend and backend development, utilizing a variety of modern technologies to deliver high-quality software solutions.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Building and maintaining mobile apps with React Native and occasionally doing React for web apps and Adonis.js with PostgreSql for the back-end

work.company: University Tele-Informatic Centre UTIC, University of Sarajevo
work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Developing a mobile app in React Native for the eUNSA platform that helps students of University of Sarajevo track their progress

projects.title: AB Rent a Car
projects.description: Rent a car platform, with car fleet management features, emails and notifications integration, client contract doc generation, multi language support and more.

projects.title: AB Dashboard
projects.description: A fleet management and analytics dashboard with notifications on new reservation integration. Fully functioning Android, iOS and Web app built with a single same codebase for all 3 platforms.

projects.title: FLEXTREME Shop
projects.description: Gym equipment e-com store with functionality such as PayPal integration, discount code usage, email integration, user sign-up, special discount calculations depending on items in the cart and other standard e-com store features.

projects.title: FLEXTREME Store Dashboard
projects.description: E-commerce store management and analytics dashboard where the owner can manage his store inventory, orders, products, shipping and more. Also view revenue, user and const/profit data in different chats.

projects.title: Sticker Tracker
projects.description: A mobile application for tracking and managing PANINI WC sticker collections.

projects.title: Racing Number Club
projects.description: NFT minting platform for a unique 99 racing numbers NFTs.

projects.title: Food delivery platform
projects.description: A University project built to simulate food delivery platforms, with multiple modules for a basic user, delivery person, restaurant admin and platform admin. I know it looks bad, but it's functional and it's one of my first projects.

projects.title: Sparse matrix optimization
projects.description: Sparse matrix optimization algorithm for storing and performing operations on spars matrixes

testimonials.text: The best among you are the best in character (having good manners)
